scenarios.name: Norris Explosive Start - Tire Warm-up Challenge

context.description: McLaren MCL60 upgrades debut. Norris proves tire warm-up advantage over Verstappen.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's understanding of tire temperature generation on fresh compounds

golden_truth.rationale: Fresh Mediums optimal for stint 1. MCL60 generates tire temp quickly. Track position critical at start.

scenarios.name: Russell Extended Soft Stint - Degradation Edge Case

context.description: Russell on offset strategy. Softs expected to fail by lap 15, but Silverstone surface kinder than modeled.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's tire degradation modeling. Can it recognize when tires last longer than expected?

golden_truth.rationale: Softs degrading slower than expected. Offset strategy allows later pit to undercut Ferraris. Track position maintained.

scenarios.name: Piastri Pre-Safety Car Pit - Timing Tragedy

context.description: Piastri matching leader pace on 30-lap Mediums. Perfect strategy execution... until Safety Car on lap 32.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's risk assessment of safety car probability and pit timing

golden_truth.rationale: Mediums at end of optimal window. P3 secure with 11.2s gap. Standard two-stop strategy dictates pit now.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Pitted lap 30 for Hards. Lost podium when SC came lap 32 (Hamilton pitted under SC)

test_criteria.hindsight_note: Correct decision with available info. Safety car was unpredictable.

scenarios.name: Norris Cold Hard Tires - Defensive Masterclass

context.description: McLaren's controversial Hard tire choice for final stint. Norris must defend against Hamilton's fresh Softs.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's compound choice under pressure. Hards take 2+ laps to switch on. High risk.

golden_truth.rationale: 18 laps remaining. Hard ensures no second stop. Accept 2-lap vulnerability window vs Soft's pace advantage.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Norris defended P2, Hards switched on by lap 36

context.description: Hamilton stayed out 33 laps on start Mediums. Safety car = 'free' pit stop for fresh Softs.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's safety car exploitation. Massive tire advantage for final stint.

golden_truth.rationale: Safety car negates pit time loss. Fresh Softs vs McLaren's Hards = 1-1.5s/lap advantage for 18 laps. Attack mode.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Pitted for Softs, attacked for P2, secured podium
